name: Abacus Ball Maze
description:
Swap the beads and sort all the colors!

Ball Maze is a witty puzzle game full of fun and challenges.

Sometimes you need to swap sometimes you need to spin. Sort the beads by color and you are going to win!

Once you start it will be hard to stop.

How many levels can you clear?
publishers: FAUNA PRODUKSIYON VE TASARIM TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
